verses.roman:
āmi yaiche pitāra, taiche tomāra bālaka
āmi tomāra pālya, tumi āmāra pālaka

synonyms: āmi—I; yaiche—just like; pitāra—of my father; taiche—similarly; tomāra—your; bālaka—son; āmi—I; tomāra—your; pālya—person to be maintained; tumi—you; āmāra—my; pālaka—maintainer.
translation: "Just as I am my father's son, so I am also yours. I am your dependent, and you are my maintainer.
